subject: Creative Suite 3 Design Premium only $269
body:
Some people entertain ideas others put them to work.

A cult is a religion with no political power.

If other people are going to talk, conversation becomes impossible.

If you don't invest very much, then defeat doesn't hurt very much and winning is not very exciting.

Fate rules the affairs of men, with no recognizable order.

I can forgive Alfred Nobel for having invented dynamite, but only a fiend in human form could have invented the Nobel Prize.

A good action is never lost it is a treasure laid up and guarded for the doer's need.

To inherit property is not to be born -- it is to be still-born, rather.

Life is not having been told that the man has just waxed the floor.

The first rule of venture capitalism should be Shoot the Inventor.

A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.

Disillusion is a natural stage that follows the holding of an illusion.

The highest qualities of character… must be earned.
